newsitem.title: USA: USFreightways unit gets Alberto-Culver contract.
newsitem.headline: USFreightways unit gets Alberto-Culver contract.

text.p: Logix, a subsidiary of USFreightways Corp, said on Monday its consumer products logistics unit Interamerican signed a five-year contract with Alberto-Culver Co.
Under the contract, Logix will manage a 235,000-square-foot distribution center in Ontario, Calif., and provide distribution and transportation services on the West Coast for Alberto-Culver.
Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
